h1_title: The Beguiling Chant of the Pagoda Realm
content: Before you head up, keep progressing forward to find another Blade Monk by the ledge. Since he's facing away, you can actually hit him from behind with a charged thrust attack to send him into the pit!
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Pagoda_Realm_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'The Beguiling Chant of the Pagoda Realm', specifically from the subsection 'Lower Pagoda (Level 1)'.
The content is as follows:
Before you head up, keep progressing forward to find another Blade Monk by the ledge. Since he's facing away, you can actually hit him from behind with a charged thrust attack to send him into the pit!
